DOC.brief_summary: This single center prospective study . The purpose study assess performance FiberSense system across glucose measurement range ( hypoglycemia hyperglycemia ) compare gold standard reference laboratory method ( YSI glucose ) healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Percutaneous Optical Fibre Glucose Sensor ( FiberSense System )
DOC.detailed_description: The FiberSense system intend use diabetic patient home use set CGM system use interstitial fluid ( ISF ) glucose indicator blood glucose levels.The purpose study assess performance FiberSense system across glucose measurement range ( hypoglycemia hyperglycemia ) compare gold standard reference laboratory method ( YSI glucose ) healthy volunteer .
DOC.criteria: Male female age ≥ 18 year old . Nondiabetic subject normal fast plasma glucose HbA1c ( ≤5.6 % ) Women pregnant , lactate plan pregnancy participation clinical study . Willingness , ability commitment comply test , procedure followup outline protocol include ( limited ) frequency clinic visit use prespecified glucose monitoring device . Willingness abstain bath swim participation measurement phase . In opinion investigator , absence physical limitation , addictive disease , underlie medical condition ( include mental health ) may preclude patient good study candidate . Currently pregnant , demonstrate positive pregnancy test screen day first sensor insertion Impaired hepatic function measure alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) ≥ three time upper reference limit . Impaired renal function measure serum creatinine > 1.2 time upper limit normal . Any active acute chronic disease condition , opinion investigator , might interfere performance study . Any active acute chronic infectious disease , opinion investigator , would pose excessive risk study staff . Current use recent exposure medication opinion investigator could influence patient 's ability participate study performance test device .
